name: The Relic (SinsTearS)
description:
The Relic Action RPG 2D side scrolling game For Android

When the sister was hit by a curse from Relic, her brother's sleep, Mel, sets out on a journey against the monsters. And  evil cult to find Relic to withdraw the curse of the sister Join with Melvin and his friends in The Relic adventure.

The Relic is a 2D Side-scrolling RPG. Players will play the role of Melvin, a young boy who travels to find Relic: Moonlight fragments to take care of his sister, as she is under the curse of Relic, leaving her to sleep. In which players will have to use their character skills to survive from monsters. And a dangerous group of cultivators invaded the players' Relics and gave them to the Goddess of Light they revered. During battle, when a player kills monsters or boss cult groups, they will receive Relic as compensation for the players to equip. And increase the character's stat to a higher level, the Relic obtained will vary depending on the difficulty level of the bosses that the player faces. Also, when a player was killed, the Relic that the player is currently equipped with will also be destroyed.
